scripts.buildjsx: (echo "const httpPrefix='';" && cat ./src/modules/modules.jsx && find ./src/theme -type f -name '*.jsx' -exec cat {} \;&& find ./src/components -type f -name 'style.jsx' -exec cat {} \; && find ./src/components -type f -name '*.jsx' ! -name 'style.jsx' | xargs cat && cat ./src/main.jsx) > ../data/main.jsx
scripts.buildlocaljsx: (cat ./src/espaddr.jsx && cat ./src/modules/modules.jsx && find ./src/theme -type f -name '*.jsx' -exec cat {} \; && find ./src/components -type f -name 'style.jsx' -exec cat {} \; && find ./src/components -type f -name '*.jsx' ! -name 'style.jsx' | xargs cat && cat ./src/main.jsx) > ../data/main.jsx
scripts.build: npm run buildjsx && npm run buildhtml
scripts.buildlocal: npm run buildlocaljsx && npm run buildhtml
